snippet.title: SCP-1344 Reveal | 14.0 Teaser  | SCP: Secret Laboratory
snippet.description:
Oddities and Offers™ is a television program owned by the organisation Marshall, Carter, and Dark and broadcasted by VKTM targeted towards the anomalous community. Those not privy to the Veil, the metaphysical barrier that conceals and separates the anomalous from the mundane, report only seeing unaltered television static. 

Read more about the game mechanics of SCP-1344, the new SCP in the upcoming 14.0 update, Heavy Duty.
https://patreon.scpslgame.com/posts/view/f907a84d-8b50-4de9-8478-fa40ff8795bb

Play the game for free: https://store.steampowered.com/app/700330/SCP_Secret_Laboratory/
Patreon page: https://patreon.scpslgame.com
Webpage: http://scpslgame.com

Credits
Voice Actors:
MC&D Salesman 1: Kazu
MC&D Salesman 2: IceyGuy https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCfldElsOzZaBGqvcX88g5rA
Non-Sentient Paper Puppet: TheDeviousMelon https://www.youtube.com/@thedeviousmelon
???: True Creature https://www.twitch.tv/true_creature

Filming: GaleTsu
Writing and editing: x3j50
Motion design and VFX: AnAnomalousWriter https://www.youtube.com/@ananomalouswriter/ https://x.com/AnomalousWriter

This video is licensed under the CC-BY-SA 4.0 - https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/

SCP: Secret Laboratory. Some rights reserved. Content relating to the SCP Foundation is licensed under Creative Commons Sharealike Attribution 4.0 or 3.0 and all concepts originate from https://scpwiki.com/ and its authors. This video, being derived from this content, is hereby also released under Creative Commons Sharealike 4.0 or 3.0. You are free to use this video in productions that are strongly related to SCP: Secret Laboratory (such as gameplay videos, reviews of the game, cinematics) without the need to credit us. In any other cases, you should do so in any meaningful way; for YouTube productions - description works just fine. For example: "The content includes work by Northwood for SCP: Secret Laboratory". This material is not sponsored by or affiliated with Unity Technologies or its affiliates. Unity is a trademark or registered trademark of Unity Technologies or its affiliates in the U.S. and elsewhere. Blood VFX is sourced from vecteezy.com.

Based on “SCP-1344” by “Crayne” and "Marshall, Carter, and Dark" by "Randomini" and "Cain": https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-1344 | https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/marshall-carter-and-dark-hub
